name: Prospective Commercial Daylighting

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Target performance based on expert judgment regarding the opportunity for potential improvement relative to current state-of-the-art

installed_cost_source.notes: Target cost based on 5 year payback period objective

_description: Commercial visible light redirection and daylighting technologies; generally, technologies that can use available visible light to offset electric lighting usage in non-perimeter zones (up to 50 ft floor plate, or more, for some technologies)
